ygData.subject: RE: Quest Info Req (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: From http://everquest.gamestats.com/ Blurred Map:   A lady by the arena in Qeynos is concerned about a map her apprentice had on him when he was shipwrecked
ygData.messageBody:
From http://everquest.gamestats.com/

Blurred Map: A lady by the arena in Qeynos is concerned about a map her
apprentice had on him when he was shipwrecked while crossing over from
Erudin. It is possible that you will have to perform another quest before
she tells you this information. On the island in Erud's crossing, you can
kill zombie sailors who will occasionally drop a blurred map. Give this to
the lady.
-----Original Message-----
From: RON_TALBOT@...
[mailto:RON_TALBOT@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 9:44 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Quest Info Req (OT)


From: RON_TALBOT@...

I'm in the same quandary. I've had my map for about 8 levels and
still don't know who to give it to. Alkazar's say there is a women
near the arena in S. Q who has lost her apprentice but I can't find
her either.

Bujold 19th (Finally)
Xegony


______________________________ Reply Separator
_________________________________
Subject: [eqbards] Quest Info Req (OT)
Author: Non-HP-kblair (kblair@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 7/29/99 6:20 AM


From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

I know this is off topic and not related (as far as I know) to Bards
specifically, but there are some very knowledgeable people on this list and
I haven't found the answer elsewhere..

I have looted a blurred map. I'm sure it's for some quest, I've even heard
rumors that it has something to do with someone in Qeynos that's building a
"titanic bridge" from Qeynos to Erudin. I've also heard rumors that the
quest actually isn't working right now.

Could anyone give a spoiler as to what to do with this map? (It's a Lore
Item) Even a pointer of where to go or something would be appreciated..

Happy journeys and in tune songs..
